202109.title: Began Computer Science Studies at Tomsk State University
202109.description: Enrolled in a BSc program in Computer Science at Tomsk State University, Russia, studying foundational concepts in programming, algorithms, and software development.

202401.title: Internship at BB Deep Learning
202401.description: Interned at BB Deep Learning, an Indian startup, from January to March 2024, developing bot interface using large language models and scraping Hinglish datasets for NLP applications.

202403.title: Left Tomsk State University
202403.description: Concluded studies at Tomsk State University in April 2024, shifting focus to practical AI and machine learning applications.

202407.title: Freelance Work for Small-Scale Businesses
202407.description: Worked as a freelancer from July to October 2024, providing software solutions for small-scale businesses, leveraging skills in AI and native development.
